channel.title: What would it take to get ALL skills to work correctly?
channel.description:
Simple question. Yes, I do mean all skills in Runescape. Including Construction, and (obviously) excluding Summoning (it isn't in the game so why bother).
Construction I've also noticed, is not in the skill window of a player's menu. Why is this?

item.title: What would it take to get ALL skills to work correctly?

item.description:
@Cutie27 wrote:

well we need a 1337 coder lol

Read full topic
